Package presentationLayer

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CmdCreateOrder
    This command creates an order in the database and sends the information about the order to fog in an email.
    CmdLogin
    This command attempts to log the employee into the website, and puts a refference to their employee reference in the session
    CmdLogout
    This command logs the employee out of the website
    CmdPageAllOrders
    This command gets all orders from the database and returns the user to allorders.jsp
    CmdPageBuildCarport
    This command gets the different roof types and returns the user to makeCarport.jsp
    CmdPageLogin
    This command returns the user to the login page - login.jsp
    CmdPageMaterial
    This command gets alle the different kinds of materials and returns the user to the editMaterials.jsp page
    CmdShowOrders
    This command finds all the orders from a given email and returns the user to the specificUserOrders.jsp page
    CmdUnknown
    This command returns the user to the index.jsp page
    CmdUpdateMaterial
    This command updates a given material and returns the user to the editMaterials.jsp page.
    CmdUpdateOrder
    This command update the statsu and/or price of a given order and returns to the allOrders.jsp page.
    CmdUpdateRoof
    This command updates a given roof and returns the user to the editMaterials.jsp page.
    CmdUpdateTool
    This command updates a given tool and returns the user to the editMaterials.jsp page.
    FrontController
    This controller handles what content to display on the website with the help of different Commands
    ServletGetDrawings
    ServletGetDrawings creates two different SVG drawings given the correct paramters: width, shed_width, length, shed_length, has_shed, has_angle.
    ServletGetPartlist
    Prints a partlist from a given Order ID
